Draw a card.

Deal 4 damage.
Draw a card.
Shuffle a Nanobots into your draw pile.

cards.name: Prototyping
cards.description: Draw cards until your hand is full and thewidow:Downgrade each card drawn.

cards.description: Draw cards until your hand is full and thewidow:Downgrade each card drawn.

cards.description:
thewidow:Beta.
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
Upgrade this card for the rest of combat.

Deal 4 damage 4 times.
Upgrade this card for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Sadistic Intent
cards.description: When you apply a debuff to an enemy, also apply 5 thewidow:Caught.

cards.name: Sadistic Intent+
cards.description: When you apply a debuff to an enemy, also apply 7 thewidow:Caught.

cards.name: The Big One
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Obtain a thewidow:Mini-Nuke.
Exhaust.

cards.name: The Big One+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Obtain a thewidow:Mini-Nuke+.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Transcendent Form
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Transform all Status and Curse cards in your hand into Widow cards, then Upgrade all cards in your hand.

cards.name: Transcendent Form+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Transform all Status and Curse cards in your hand into Widow cards, then Upgrade all cards in your hand twice.

cards.name: Unstoppable
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Remove all your Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Unstoppable+
cards.description: Deal 13 damage. Remove all your Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable.

relics.name: Cyberheart
relics.description: At the start of combat, Upgrade 3 random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: It beats just the way you designed it to.

relics.name: Anarchist's Cookbook
relics.description: At the start of combat, obtain a Grenade.
relics.flavorText: Every good wife needs a good cookbook.

relics.name: Sewing Kit
relics.description: Beta cards have an additional Upgrade.
relics.flavorText: A great way to pass the time, and make something useful too.

relics.name: Hourglass Mark
relics.description: While you have at least 5 Web, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Usually considered an omen of impending doom.

relics.name: Water Filter
relics.description: Potions have a 25% chance to not be used up.
relics.flavorText: A bit stale, but it'll keep you going.

relics.name: Holo-Projector
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain [E] and Downgrade 2 random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: It's another you! Just not quite as coordinated.

relics.name: Perfect Heart
relics.description: Replaces Cyberheart. At the start of each turn, Upgrade 2 random cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: Can you even call yourself human anymore?

potions.name: Neurostimulant
potions.description: Permanently Upgrade a card in your hand.

potions.name: Pulse Bomb
potions.description: Deal 20 damage to one enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.

keywords.name: Beta
keywords.description: This card can be upgraded any number of times.

keywords.name: Beta+
keywords.description: This card can be upgraded any number of times. Each upgrade is progressively better.

keywords.name: Beta-X
keywords.description: This card can be upgraded the specified number of times. Each upgrade is unique and in a random order.

keywords.name: Caught
keywords.description: Caught enemies take more damage from the next attack. Decays by half each turn.

keywords.name: Downgrade
keywords.description: Downgrading a card undoes the effects of one Upgrade that has been applied to it.

keywords.name: Grenade
keywords.description:
Potion
Deal 10 damage to an enemy.

keywords.name: Grenade+
keywords.description:
Potion
Deal 15 damage to an enemy.

keywords.name: Mini-Nuke
keywords.description:
Potion
Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Mini-Nuke+
keywords.description:
Potion
Deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Necrosis
keywords.description: Increases damage taken from Attacks. Reduced by half each turn.

keywords.name: Paralysis
keywords.description: Upon reaching 10 Paralysis, reduce by 10 and Stun the target.

keywords.name: Pulse Bomb
keywords.description:
Potion
Deal 20 damage to an enemy and 10 damage to all other enemies.

keywords.name: Pulse Bomb+
keywords.description:
Potion
Deal 30 damage to an enemy and 15 damage to all other enemies.

keywords.name: Sapped
keywords.description: Reduces Attack damage dealt. Decays by half after every attack and every turn.

keywords.name: Shocked
keywords.description: Shocked enemies take damage when attacking. Decreases by 1 each turn.

keywords.name: Web
keywords.description: When attacked, apply Caught to the attacker, increasing damage taken by the next attack, and reduce by 1.
